#summary Steps to setup the development environment on eclipse.
= Introduction =

The steps to setup the development environment on eclipse can be followed using the tutorial shown at [http://blog.springsource.com/2010/12/17/spring-android-and-maven-part-1 SpringSource blog 1] and [http://blog.springsource.com/2011/02/09/spring-android-and-maven-part-2/ SpringSource blog 2]


= Notes=

It's important to follow all the plugin installation instructions and to make sure that ANDROID_HOME is correctly setted. Also make sure you have an Android Device (ADV) named as 9.
